original_text: The king of Jerusalem was called Adoni-Zedek. He heard how Joshua had taken Ai city, as he had also taken Jericho city. He heard that Joshua had destroyed those cities and their kings. He also heard that the Israelites had made an agreement with the Gibeonites. They promised that they would not attack the Gibeonites. He knew that the Gibeonites now lived among the Israelites.
korean_text: 그 때에 여호수아가 아이를 빼앗아 진멸하되 여리고와 그 왕에게 행한 것 같이 아이와 그 왕에게 행한 것과 또 기브온 주민이 이스라엘과 화친하여 그 중에 있다 함을 예루살렘 왕 아도니세덱이 듣고

sentences.original_text: The king of Jerusalem was called Adoni-Zedek
He heard how Joshua had taken Ai city
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여호수아가 아이 성을 점령했다는 소식을 들었다

sentences.original_text: as he had also taken Jericho city
sentences.korean_translation: 여호수아가 여리고 성도 점령했다는 소식을 들었다

sentences.original_text: He heard that Joshua had destroyed those cities
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여호수아가 그 성들을 파괴했다는 소식을 들었다
그리고 그 성들의 왕들도 파괴했다는 소식을 들었다

sentences.original_text: He also heard that the Israelites had made an agreement
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이스라엘 사람들이 약속을 맺었다는 소식도 들었다
기브온 사람들과 약속을 맺었다는 소식도 들었다

sentences.original_text: They promised that they would not attack
He knew that the Gibeonites now lived
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 기브온 사람들이 이제 살고 있다는 것을 알았다
이스라엘 사람들 사이에 살고 있다는 것을 알았다
